Name: Extreme Truck Stunts
About the game: We think you've heard a lot of legends about how hard it is to be a real truck driver. Well, the time has come for you to feel this on your own skin. But this is only the surface of the iceberg, because what we have prepared for you, you will tell even your grandchildren. Truck stunts... how does this challenge sound to you? We choose you especially, because we know how fearless you are. There have been attempts with a motorcycle, a car, but with a truck it's already another level. This is a simulation like no other. Your mission is to pass all the challenges as a truck driver. You know where to find the keys to the truck :) Game Features : - 3 types of trucks - 20 levels - Different weather conditions (snow, rain, sun)
